mapper.sql: select id, name, parent_id, site_id, code, cover, path_rule, path, only_url, remote_url, page_size, allow_contribute, sort, hidden, category_model_id, single_page, top_pages, contain_child, create_id, modified_id, create_time, update_time from cms_category
mapper.select: SELECT category.id, category.id AS `key`, category.`name` AS title, category.`code`, category.parent_id AS `parentId`, IF(category.parent_id = '0', 1, 0) AS hasParent FROM cms_category category ORDER BY sort ASC

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM cms_category WHERE code =#{code}
AND id!=#{id}

SELECT own.id id, own.`name`, own.code, own.path, own.cover, own.path_rule pathRule, own.remote_url remoteUrl, own.only_url onlyUrl, own.contain_child containChild, own.single_page singlePage, own.page_size pageSize, own.allow_contribute allowContribute, attr.title, attr.keywords, attr.description, attr.`data`, own.sort, own.hidden, own.category_model_id categoryModelId, own.create_time createTime, own.update_time updateTime, IFNULL(own.parent_id, '0') AS parentId, own.top_pages AS topPages, IFNULL(parent.name, '父分类') AS parentName FROM cms_category own LEFT JOIN cms_category parent ON parent.id = own.parent_id LEFT JOIN cms_category_attribute attr ON attr.category_id = own.id WHERE own.id = #{id}
SELECT own.id, own.`name`, own.parent_id, own.code, own.path, own.cover, own.path_rule, own.only_url, own.contain_child, own.single_page FROM cms_category own WHERE own.parent_id = #{categoryId}

SELECT category.id, category.id, category.`name`, category.`code`, category.parent_id parentId, category.single_page singlePage, category.allow_contribute allowContribute FROM cms_category category ORDER BY sort DESC

SELECT category.id, attr.title, attr.keywords, attr.description, attr.data, category.name, category.parent_id parentId, category.site_id siteId, category.code, category.path_rule pathRule, category.path, category.only_url onlyUrl, category.remote_url remoteUrl, category.page_size pageSize, category.allow_contribute allowContribute, category.sort, category.hidden, category.category_model_id categoryModelId, category.single_page singlePage, category.top_pages topPages, category.contain_child containChild FROM cms_category category LEFT JOIN cms_category_attribute attr ON attr.category_id = category.id
AND hidden = 0
ORDER BY sort ASC
